report.name: COPD015 - Patients on the COPD register
report.description: COPD015: The contractor establishes and maintains a register of: 1. Patients with a clinical diagnosis of COPD before 1 April 2023; and 2. Patients with a clinical diagnosis of COPD on or after 1 April 2023 whose diagnosis has been confirmed by a quality assured post-bronchodilator spirometry FEV1/FVC ratio below 0.7 between 3 months before or 6 months after diagnosis (or if newly registered at the practice in the preceding 12 months without a record of spirometry having been performed, a record of an FEV1/FVC ratio below 0.7 recorded within 6 months of registration); and 3. Patients with a clinical diagnosis of COPD on or after 1 April 2023 who are unable to undertake spirometry.

report.name: Earliest unresolved COPD diagnosis
report.description: Earliest unresolved COPD diagnosis was on or after 1 April 2023 and who have a record of a postbronchodilator spirometry FEV1/FVC ratio of below 0.7 in the period spanning 93 days (3 months) before and no later than 186 days (6 months) after diagnosis

criterion.description: First FEV1/FVC ratio with value less than 0.7
First FEV1/FVC ratio of less than 0.7

report.name: Unresolved COPD + FEV1/FVC ratio <0.7 3-6m post diagnosis
report.description: Patients from the specified population whose earliest unresolved COPD diagnosis was on or after 1 April 2023 and who have a record of a postbronchodilator spirometry FEV1/FVC ratio of below 0.7 in the period spanning 93 days (3 months) before and no later than 186 days (6 months) after diagnosis.
